Articles.Content:
(First of all, this post has the prefix 'special' because there is no 'video' prefix. If the prefix is wrong please tell me, thank you!)

Hello everyone and welcome to my 1st post on the forums!

I made a Cinematic using one of my favourite songs of all time (Oblivion by M83 feat. Susanne SundfÃƒÂ¸r) and I thought it would be awesome if I mix it with one of my favourite games in a Cinematic.

I'm not the best videoeditor out there but I'm happy with the result. I was recording for 1 hour and a half playing almost without the flying GUI (Only used to control the orbit, burn times...) and it was fun as hell. I didn't went to another planet for a while and it felt like the first time.

Well... without saying more here it is.

http://youtu.be/TL_lp_fF8mM

(No cheats, MechJeb, Protractor or any mods like that were used in this video)

I hope you like it :3

(Oh, and sorry If my English is bad, I'm Spanish)

Edited August 20, 2013 by AilinNyan

Very nice video and good use of the Oblivion soundtrack. My only suggestion would be to download the mod called KerbCam. It allows you to create really nice camera paths to get really nice angles and whatnot.
Very nice video,you shouldn't be happy with the result,you should be AWESOMELY HAPPY LIKE JEB IS WHEN HE BUZZES THE TOWER.TWICE.

Very nice video and good use of the Oblivion soundtrack. My only suggestion would be to download the mod called KerbCam. It allows you to create really nice camera paths to get really nice angles and whatnot.

Oh, thanks! I will totally check that out

Very nice video,you shouldn't be happy with the result,you should be AWESOMELY HAPPY LIKE JEB IS WHEN HE BUZZES THE TOWER.TWICE.

Thank you! I will make more videos in the future exploring the Kerbol system
